DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine how adding a carbohydrate beverage to a meal with different protein levels affects the rate at which one's body burns fats, sugars, and proteins.
DOC.criteria: BMI less than 25 kg/m2 ability to sign the consent form availability of transportation percent body fat greater than or equal to 25% for males and 35% for females allergies to any study foods more than a 10% change in body weight within the past 2 months current or planned pregnancy lactation metabolic illness/disease(s) active cancer or in shortterm remission (less than 3 years) infectious diseases alcohol or drug abuse tobacco use presence of acute illness taking medications known to affect energy expenditure and appetite
